DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the cognitive and behavioral outcomes including image findings of school-aged children who were born preterm compared with who were born term gestational age.
DOC.brief_title: Cognitive and Behavioral Outcomes of School-aged Children Who Were Born Preterm
DOC.detailed_description: There are lots of studies published that school-aged children who were born preterm has some behavioral problems in school and they also have poor academical achievement.
DOC.criteria: children former preterm infants < 32 weeks of gestation or 1,500gm of birth weight children former normal term infants major congenital anomaly neuromuscular disease chromosomal anomaly
